metadata.title: CVE-2023-52591 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:reiserfs: Avoid touching renamed directory if parent does not change TheVFS will not be locking moved directory if its parent does not change.Change reiserfs rename code to avoid touching renamed directory if itsparent does not change as without locking that can corrupt the filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
